column2: PENNSYLVANIA DRIVERS PERMIT TEST
Question Text
1. The effect that lack of sleep has on your safe driving ability is the same as:
column8: the effect that aggressive driving has.
column10: the effect that lack of coffee has.

column2: 2. A yellow arrow means:
column4: The same as a steady yellow light.
column6: If you intend to turn in the direction of the arrow, be prepared to stop.
column8: Do not go in the direction of the arrow.

column2: 3. What type of pavement marking shows you which lane you must use for a turn?
4. A vehicle is stopped at a crosswalk to permit a pedestrian to cross the roadway. The driver of the vehicle approaching from the rear should:
column6: not overtake and pass the stopped vehicle.
column8: overtake and pass the stopped vehicle.

column2: 5. What happens if two vehicles reach at the same time an intersection with four-way stop signs?
column4: The driver on the right yields to the driver on the left.
column8: The first vehicle to reach the intersection must yield.
column10: The driver on the left yields to the driver on the right.

column2: 6. It is important for drivers to know that trucks:
column4: require more space for turning movements.
column6: take longer than cars to stop.
column8: require less time to pass on an incline than cars.
column10: are easier for the driver to operate.

column2: 7. This sign indicates:
8. If your turn signals fail, you should use _____ to indicate your intention to turn.
9. You must come to a full stop at a yield sign:
column8: Before you decrease speed and reach the intersection.

column2: 10. Left turns on a red light are allowed:
column8: at intersections, after stopping, if the way is clear.
column10: from a one-way street into a one-way street.

column2: 11. When you pass another vehicle, before you return to the right lane, you must:
column4: make sure you can see the front bumper of the vehicle you passed.
column6: look at your interior rear-view mirror.

column2: 12. Which shape is a railroad advance warning sign?
13. This sign means:
column4: The divided highway on which drivers are traveling ends ahead.
column8: The highway ahead is divided into two one-way roadways.

column2: 14. When a driver is turning and a pedestrian is crossing without a traffic light, __________ must yield the right-of-way.
15. An edge line that angles toward the center of the road indicates that:
16. On slippery roads, drivers should:
column4: leave more space in front of their vehicle.
column6: increase their speed to avoid hydroplaning.

column2: 17. What does a yellow arrow signal mean?
column4: The same as the yellow light, but applies only to movement in the direction of the arrow.
column6: The same as a green light.
column8: Vehicles moving in all directions must stop if they can. The light will soon be red.

column2: 18. This road sign means:
column4: Vehicles turning left must make a U-turn.
column6: Left turns are not allowed where this sign is displayed.
column8: Drivers cannot make a complete turn to go in the opposite direction.
